This hotel, in my opinion, is NOT friendly at all for guests bringing their own vehicles, whether cars or motorcycles. Their target demographic seems to be travelers heading to the airport or in transit, who likely won't have personal transportation (they do offer a free airport shuttle). The parking area for vehicles (both cars and motorcycles) is located a significant 250 meters away from the hotel lobby. This entire 250-meter stretch is outdoors, meaning if it's raining, you'll get wet walking from the parking lot to the lobby or your hotel room. The parking lot itself is also outdoors, and the walk to the lobby is entirely uncovered. The only other option is valet parking, which incurs an additional fee of IDR 100,000 if you want to avoid the walk. Furthermore, to drive from the parking area to the hotel lobby, you have to take a roundabout route of 2.4 kilometers. During peak hours, this can easily take 10-15 minutes due to the one-way street in front of the hotel. This hotel is definitely not suitable if you are traveling with your own vehicle. On a positive note, the rooms have been recently renovated and are very nice, especially the Suite room I stayed in. The Suite room is incredibly spacious, featuring a living room, dining area, another living space, and even a kitchen area with a two-door refrigerator. However, there didn't appear to be a stove. There are two bathrooms; the one near the entrance only has a toilet. The main bathroom, located within the bedroom, has both a shower and a bathtub. The TVs in the living room and bedroom are both very large. However, the breakfast, in my opinion, was very standard, even bordering on lacking for a 5-star hotel. Many other 5-star hotels offer a breakfast experience that is far superior in terms of variety, menu options, and the friendliness of the breakfast staff. The car park also only had about 3 cars (very few for a 5-star hotel parking lot), while the motorcycle parking was full. So, in my opinion, this hotel is very suitable for transit passengers and those without their own vehicles. If you have a car or motorcycle, I would recommend staying at one of the many other hotels in the airport area. Thank you.
